thread.title: Free silk tie worth £24.95

author: The Telegraph
title: Free silk tie worth £24.95
text: The Telegraph has teamed up with Charles Tyrwhitt to offer a free silk tie worth £24.95 when you spend £22.95 or more on shirts. Claim in store at Charles Tyrwhitt, order online or over the phone*. In addition to choosing any free silk tie from the range, Telegraph readers can also claim an exclusive offer across hundreds of Charles Tyrwhitt formal and casual shirts, all discounted to £22.95 (usually £70-£80). Choose from hundreds of shirts in any of their ranges, be it smart formal shirts, laid-back casual shirts and polos, or even choose from their popular business casual range.There are 3 fits to choose from, as well as a wide range of sleeve lengths and collar sizes. Click here to find your nearest participating store *Postage & packaging applies to online and over the phone orders (UK standard delivery £4.95) How to Claim See the newspaper on Saturday, October 24, 2015 telegraph.co.uk
